function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of validation for system used for early diagnosis of COVID-19 in students","Impact":"Inaccurate diagnosis and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Validate the system and its effectiveness for early diagnosis","Technologies":"Wearable sensors, mobile apps","People":"Students, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient focus on post-COVID-19-infection effects on patients","Impact":"Lack of understanding and potential inadequate care for post-COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Conduct more research to understand post-COVID-19 effects and develop appropriate care strategies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Post-COVID-19 patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Relying on incomplete symptom screening for COVID-19","Impact":"Misdiagnosis and potential spread of the virus due to reliance on incomplete symptoms","Mitigation":"Develop comprehensive symptom screening methods and use of reliable technologies","Technologies":"Wearable devices, mobile apps","People":"Healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions"}]}
